alert.note: Alert for Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 10:07PM EST until January 17 at 11:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, lake effect snow showers. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
